name: CreateFullStockCount
description: Initiate the Full Stock Count process for the current store. **Prevents basic store functionalities once started.**

properties.name: AllowStockMutationsDuringCount
properties.description:
When this value is set to true, EVA will allow for stockmutations to be done during the fullstockcount.
WARNING: setting this value to true will make the outcome of the fullstockcount unreliable, because quantities on the full stock count label products can be changed before or after a count has been done.

properties.name: CreateFullStockCountLabelsForShelves
properties.description: When supplied, it will automatically call `AddLabelToFullStockCount` for each Shelf defined in your replenishment configuration. Ignored when IsExternal is set to true.

properties.name: InitialFullStockCountLabels
properties.description: When supplied, it will automatically call `AddLabelToFullStockCount` for each InitialLabel. Ignored when IsExternal or CreateFullStockCountLabelsForShelves is set to true.

properties.name: IsExternal
properties.description:
Indicates if the full stock count is done by an external party.
When false, the full stock count will be created and all basic store functionalities will be blocked once started.

When true, the full stock count will be created with a snapshot from the current stock. To set the result of the external full stock count, the 'UploadExternalFullStockCount' can be called.
Basic store functionalities will remaining in working order. Deviations will be calculated based on stock mutations.
The UserTask will be started automatically.

properties.name: RecountInterval
properties.description: When supplied, it will automatically create a validation recount based on the given recount interval. Ignored when IsExternal is set to true.

properties.name: ReturnCurrentStock
properties.description: When set to true, the service will return the current stock information.

properties.name: Code
properties.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

properties.name: RequestID
properties.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: A short description of the error type.

properties.name: ExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
